casebody.data:
STATE
v.
DESPERADOS, INC. and Perez. No. 629A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 27, 2007. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of April 2007 by Defendants for Extension of Time to File Brief: "Motion Allowed. Defendants (Desperados & Perez) shall have up to and including the 28th day of May 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of April 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
